main_definition: Teams refer to a group of individuals working together towards a common goal, often in sports or other collaborative activities.

meanings_and_examples.example: The basketball team won the championship by playing well as a cohesive unit.
Our project management team collaborated to meet our quarterly objectives efficiently.
In a hackathon, various teams come together to build innovative solutions within the given time frame.
The medical research team is composed of scientists with different specializations working on disease treatment.
A task force was formed to address the city's rising crime rate and develop strategies for improvement.
